pkgmetadata.longdescription: aioslimproto==================================[![pypi_badge](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/aioslimproto.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/aioslimproto)**AIOSlimProto**SLIMProto implementation in async python allows you to control squeezebox players (and compatibles)Requires Python 3.10+ and uses asyncio.For usage examples, see the examples folder.
